altTitles.th: ฤดูที่เปลี่ยนผ่าน

description.en: Night after night, a mysterious woman runs through Yoongun’s dreams. So when he happens to catch a glimpse of her in the flesh, he devises an intricate plan to lure her into his arms, determined to bring his subconscious fantasies to life. In a twist of fate, Kyu-young is searching for a way to nurse her broken heart when Yoongun makes his timely entrance. Seizing the opportunity, Yoongun proposes a tempting solution to Kyu-young’s heartache. He suggests becoming her rebound, a tool for revenge against her unfaithful ex-fiancé. Seduced by this irresistible offer, Kyu-young’s life takes an unexpected turn. Will he be her unwitting destroyer or an unexpected savior?

description.cs:
Krásná Athanasia byla zabita rukou svého biologického otce, chladnokrevného císaře Clauda de Alger Obelia! Je to jen hloupá pohádka na dobrou noc... dokud se jedna žena neprobudí a náhle nezjistí, že se stala onou nešťastnou princeznou! Potřebuje plán, jak přežít svůj odsouzený osud, a čas se krátí. Bude se řídit plánem A, žít co nejtišeji, aniž by si jí všiml nechvalně proslulý císař? Plán B, shromáždit dostatek peněz na útěk z paláce? Nebo jí zůstane plán C, sladkými řečičkami se dostat do otcovy přízně?!

---

description.de:
Wiedergeboren in einer Welt voller magischer Kräfte und als Tochter des Kaisers! Besser hätte es Athanasia kaum treffen können. Wäre nicht der Kaiser ein grausamer Tyrann, der sein Kind ablehnt und vernachlässigt. Noch als Baby wird Athanasia bewusst, dass in ihrem neuen Leben etwas ganz und gar nicht stimmt! Wenn sie nicht eine Überlebensstrategie entwickelt, wird sie an ihrem 18. Geburtstag auf Geheiß ihres eigenen Vaters sterben. So weit darf es nicht kommen. Also macht sich Athanasia daran ihr Schicksal zu verändern...

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I had become a princess! But out of all the characters from this romance novel to be reborn into, why must it be the princess whose fate it is to die by the hands of her own blood-related father, the emperor?! If I want to live, I must never enter his sight. However…  

"Since when did this kind of scumbag start living in my castle?"

Without a single tear to shed nor a drop of blood to spill, that cruel and cold emperor, Claude! Will I, the Princess Athanasia who was caught by him, survive?

"I… What should I do…"

---
The beautiful Athanasia was killed at the hands of her own biological father, Claude de Alger Obelia, the cold-blooded emperor! It’s just a silly bedtime story… until one woman wakes up to suddenly find she’s become that unfortunate princess! She needs a plan to survive her doomed fate, and time is running out. 

Will she go with Plan A, live as quietly as possible without being noticed by the infamous emperor? Plan B, collect enough money to escape the palace? Or will she be stuck with Plan C, sweet-talking her way into her father’s good graces?!


---

description.fa:
آتاناسیا‌ی زیبا در سن ۱۸ سالگی به دست پدر خودش به قتل میرسه، کلود دِ الگر اوبلیا، یه امپراطور بی احساس! این فقط ی داستان شب بچگونس... تا اینکه دختره از خواب بیدار شد و فهمید به یه شاهزاده بدبخت تبدیل شده! اون برای زنده موندن از دست سرنوشتش به نقشه نیاز داشت، و یکمم زمان برای فرار. بنظرتون اون میتونه با نقشه A راحت زندگی کنه بدون اینکه مورد توجه امپراطور قرار بگیره؟ یا نقشه B، که میخواد پول کافی جمع کنه و بعدش بزنه به چاک؟ یاعم نقشه C؟ با شیرین زبونی و کاوایی بودن خودشو تو دل پدرش جا کنه؟!

---

description.fr:
Areu Areu, je dois sauver ma vie! Quand cette femme se réveille dans le corps d'une princesse, elle comprend vite qu’elle n’est pas devenu n’importe qui. Elle est Athanasia, célèbre héroïne de roman, qui meurt à 18 ans entre les mains de son impitoyable père, l'Empereur Obelia (Claude, pour les intimes). Elle n'a donc que quelques années devant elle pour changer le cours du destin. Evidemment, le plus simple serait de réussir à amadouer ce père qui la déteste. A moins de s'enfuir? Bon, pour cela il faudra déjà marcher plus vite qu'à quatre pattes!!

---

description.id:
Athanasia yang cantik terbunuh di tangan ayah kandungnya sendiri, Claude de Alger Obelia, kaisar berdarah dingin! Itu hanya cerita pengantar tidur yang konyol ... sampai seorang wanita bangun dan tiba-tiba menemukan dia menjadi putri yang malang itu! Dia membutuhkan rencana untuk bertahan dari nasibnya yang terkutuk, dan waktu hampir habis. Akankah dia pergi dengan Rencana A, hidup setenang mungkin tanpa diketahui oleh kaisar yang terkenal itu? Rencana B, kumpulkan cukup uang untuk kabur dari istana? Atau akankah dia terjebak dengan Rencana C, berbicara manis tentang kebaikan ayahnya?!

---

description.it:
La bella Athanasia fu uccisa per mano del suo stesso padre biologico, Claude de Alger Obelia, l'imperatore a sangue freddo! E' solo una sciocca storia della buonanotte... Fino a quando una donna si sveglia e scopre all'improvviso di essere diventata quella sfortunata principessa! Ha bisogno di un piano per sopravvivere al suo destino condannato, e il tempo sta per scadere. Sarà lei andare con il piano. A, vivere il più silenziosamente possibile senza essere notato dal famigerato imperatore? Piano B, raccogliere abbastanza soldi per sfuggire al palazzo? O lei sarà bloccata con il piano. C, parlare dolcemente percorrendo la strada per aggraziarsi il padre?

---

description.ja:
目を覚ましたらとあるネット小説の脇役姫、「アタナシア」というお姫様に転生していた。
しかし、アタナシアは父親の皇帝・クロードに見捨てられた姫で、周囲にも冷たく扱われている。
小説の中では、妹で主人公姫のジェニットに毒を盛った濡れ衣を着せられ、
１８歳の誕生日にクロードに殺されてしまう運命のアタナシア。
なんとしても死亡エンドを回避するため、お城を出る準備をこっそり進めていたアタナシアは、
ある日クロードの住む宮に入ってしまい――？

---

description.ko:
어느 날 눈을 떠보니 공주님이 되었다!

금수저를 입에 물고 태어난 건 좋은데,
하필이면 친아버지의 손에 죽는 비운의 공주라니!

피도 눈물도 없는 냉혈한 황제 클로드!
죽고 싶지 않다면 그의 눈에 띄어서는 안 된다.
그런데,

“언제부터 내 성에 이런 버러지가 살았지?”

황제의 눈에 띄어버린 아타나시아.
과연 그녀는 살아남을 수 있을까?

“나…… 어떡하지……?”

description.pl:
Piękna Athanasia została zabita przez własnego biologicznego ojca, Claude de Alger Obelia, zimnokrwistego władcę! To zwykła, głupiutka historia do łóżka... do czasu, aż pewna kobieta budzi się i odkrywa, iż jest tą nieszczęsną księżniczką! Potrzebuje planu, by przetrwać w wskazanej przyszłości, gdy czas ucieka. Pójdzie w ślady Planu A, żyć tak cicho jak to jest możliwe bez zauważenia przez niesławnego władcę? Plan B, zebrać wystarczająco pieniędzy żeby uciec z pałacu? Lub może utknie w Planie C, by słodką gadką wkupić się w łaski swego ojca?!

---

description.ru:
Когда я открыла глаза, то стала принцессой. Но почему из всех персонажей этой истории именно принцессой, судьба которой тесно переплетена с кровавым Императором? Если я хочу выжить, то должна быть неприметной для его глаз. «Когда это в моём дворце начали жить ничтожные людишки?». Человек, у которого нет ни капли сочувствия, ни слезинки — этот холодный император Клод! Неужели Атанасия, пойманная императором, сможет выжить? «Что… Что мне делать?..»

---

description.uk:
Прекрасна Атанасія загинула від рук власного батька, холоднокровного імператора Клода де Альджео Обелія. Це була просто дурнувата історія, щоб почитати перед сном… поки одна жінка не прокинулась у тілі той бідолашної принцеси! Їй потрібен план, щоб уникнути лихої долі, а час уже спливає. Чи слідуватиме вона плану А, і житиме тихо, не привертаючи уваги сумнозвісного імператора? Чи обере план B: зібрати побільше грошей і втекти з палацу? Чи застрягне на плані C, солодкими словами, добиваючись батьківської турботи.

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---

description.en:
Instead of being caught by Prince Charming, I've fallen into a complete nightmare! Not only did I transmigrate into a trashy romance fantasy novel, but I fell from the sky and ended up in the arms of the mad villain, Edwin Crawford. Before I knew it, he called me his wife from the heavens and was raving about some prophecy. I don't even know who I am, so how can I be his wife?! Until I figure out what is happening, will it be safe to stay in the embrace of the Mad Dragon of the West?

---
**Link:**

title.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Gamer

altTitles.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Player

description.en: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

altTitles.ja: サクシード

description.en:
The state of progress is where one must look to the past in order to protect the future…but what must be done for the present? 
From legendary WSJ mangaka Osamu Akimoto comes a one-shot where memories are the key to understanding everything: 
past, present and future…

altTitles.ja: さいくるびより

description.en: Psych House--a special home set up for those with supernatural powers. One day, Nemuru, a boy with a Psych that allows him to change size, invites Kotone, a girl with a teleportation Psych, to live at Psych House. The mysterious but normal days of those with psychic powers now begins!
description.pt-br: Psych House--uma casa especial para aqueles com poderes sobrenaturais. Certo dia, Nemuru, um garoto com uma Psico que lhe permite alterar tamanhos, convida Kotone, uma garota com Psico de teleporte, para viver na Psych House. Agora começam os dias misteriosos, mas ainda normais, daqueles com poderes psíquicos!

altTitles.en: Especially if the Match Will Be Held Here
特に負けても構わない戦いがそこにはある

description.en:
From Suimasen Scanlations:  
  
Milan’s father is a soccer manager. On his deathbed, he entrusts her with the team, FC Sudden Death. Once a great power in J1, they’ve found themselves kicked out of the league and on the skids. Will Milan be able to turn the team around, or will she fall victim to the numerous pranks the team members play on each other?

altTitles.ja: くまみこ

description.en: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.

altTitles.zh: 靠诅咒修仙的我有点不对劲

altTitles.zh-ro: Kao Zuzhou Xiuxian De Wo Youdian Buduijin
Kào Zǔzhòu Xiūxiān De Wǒ Yǒudiǎn Bùduìjìn

description.en:
You don’t belong to this world, and yet you wish to step onto the path of cultivation. Targeted by the Heavens, they cast a curse on you, one unbreakable even by immortals. All changes in your body will be reversed, and you will no longer be able to cultivate again.

Jiang Chen tries to cultivate, but realises that his spiritual energy flows backwards, and scatters in all directions.

When he was in despair, he was struck by lightning.

[You’ve been struck by lightning, your flesh and blood is eroded and your dantian is shattered. The curse takes effect, and regenerates your body, granting you the power of vitality.]

[Your dantian regenerates, and become invincible.]

[The lost spiritual energy gathers in the body automatically, and flows through the meridians. You’ve stepped into the Qi Refinement stage first layer… second layer… third layer!]

Jiang Chen fell into silence, “???”

I have to cultivate like this?
description.zh: 你本不属此界之人，妄想踏入修行之路，被天道盯上，降下万道诅咒，仙不可破，你身上出现任何变化都将反转，一生无法踏入修行之路。】 姜尘尝试修炼，发现灵气倒流，溃散四方。 心中绝望时，一道落雷击中。 【你被落雷击中，血肉糜烂，丹田破碎，诅咒生效，肉身修复，获得生机之力。】 　　【丹田恢复，蕴上大道规则，无坚不摧。】 【流失灵气，自动集身，贯通经脉，踏入练气一层……二层……三层！】 姜尘陷入沉默：“？？？” 合着，我要这样修炼？

title.en: Kokoro no Koe ga Moreyasui Maid-san (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: 心の声が漏れやすいメイドさん

altTitles.en: The Maid whose Inner Thoughts Leak Out Easily

altTitles.zh-hk: 容易漏出心聲的女僕小姐到我家來了

description.en:
Being honest is good. Probably.

With Shuuji’s parents overseas on business, a maid has come to his house. She’s cute but she can’t keep a secret?! With her expressionless gaze, she thoughtlessly says the craziest things…! Living with this maid whose true thoughts are laid bare, a second year high school boy is thoroughly made fun of!

After leaving his mark on Japan, Dai is taking on Europe!

Direct continuation of Blue Giant, a manga about the evolution of the young saxophonist Dai Miyamoto in the jazz world. Blue Giant Supreme sees our protagonist travel to Europe. Having just arrived in Munich, without being able to speak a word of German and with just average English, he manages to secure a roof over his head, food and drink, but struggles to get the most important thing: a place where he can have his music heard.
 
A whole new element added on top of the enthralling story that enchants every music lover: the discovery of a new culture. Dai will travel all over Europe, from Germany to France, accompanied by his instrument, growing as a musician and a person in the process of fulfilling his dream of becoming the best in the world.


[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/)
Webtoon series based on the game "Solo Leveling: Arise", this spin-off is set around the original series and is focused on various characters.

altTitles.pt-br: Convento do Sino Oriental ~ Pergaminho Proibido

altTitles.ja: 東方鈴奈庵　～ Forbidden Scrollery.

altTitles.de: Östliche Klause der Glockenrübe ~ Forbidden Scrollery.

description.en: Touhou official comic published by Kadokawa in Comp Ace that began publishing on October 26, 2012. The story is written by ZUN, with illustrations by Moe Harukawa. It introduces a human book renter and collector Kosuzu Motoori as the main character, with the story centered around her mysterious ability to decipher any book no matter the language or script, and her assortment of various rare and dangerous demon books.
description.pt-br: “Kosuzu Motoori é uma funcionária da biblioteca Suzunaan que acaba de despertar um poder que lhe permite traduzir tudo que lê, inclusive o “Livro Youma”, um livro que descreve as criaturas yokais. Reimu Hakurei, um a exorcista especialista em resolver os mistérios que abrange os yokais, esta preocupada com o rumo que Kosuzu pode dar ao livro…"

title.en: The End is a Game to Me

altTitles.en: The End Of World Is A Game

description.en:
Go Cheon-su, is an unemployed Game Streamer. With only 1 viewer.

One day, he is picked as a Player and is thrown into a real-world survival game.

The game clear condition is to not die. The 24*7 Survival Stream begins.

altTitles.en: Dragon Ball Super - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール超 カラー版
ドラゴンボール超

description.ar: يتّبع دراغون بول سوبر آثار معركة غوكو الشرسة مع ماجين بوو وهو يحاول الحفاظ على سلام الأرض الهش.
description.en: Having defeated Boo, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.ja: ピアス (井上雄彦)

description.pt-br: Uma one-shot do mestre Inoue, conta a história de dois jovens que se conhecem por acaso, mas estão sofrendo por problemas familiares...

altTitles.ja: パリピ孔明

description.en: General of the Three Kingdoms, Kongming had struggled his whole life, facing countless battles that made him into the accomplished strategist he was. So on his deathbed, he wished only to be reborn into a peaceful world...and was sent straight to modern-day party-central, Tokyo! Can even a brilliant strategist like Kongming adapt to the wild beats and even wilder party people?!
description.ja: 五丈原の戦いで死期を迎えた名軍師・諸葛亮孔明は、若い肉体に戻り、現代日本へと転生した！ 渋谷のパリピ達に誘われ、たどり着いたのはダンスミュージックが鳴り響くチャラめなクラブ。そこでシンガーを目指す月見英子と出逢い、孔明の二度目の人生が幕を開けた！ 三国志時代、天下泰平のために生きた彼は、なんの為に生きるのか－－!!
description.ko:
오장원 전투에서 최후를 맞이한 명군사 제갈량(공명)은
젊은 육체로 돌아가 현대 일본에 환생한다!
시부야의 파티피플들에게 이끌려 도착 곳은
댄스 뮤직이 울려 퍼지는 경박스러운 클럽.
그곳에서 가수를 꿈꾸는 츠키미 에이코와 만나며
공명의 두 번째 인생이 막을 연다!
description.ru: Знаменитый стратег и военачальник Чжугэ Лян (Кунмин), погибший в битве при Годжохаре в полях Учжан, вернулся в молодое тело и перевоплотился в современной Японии, где он встретился с начинающей певицей Цукими Эйко, песни которой запали ему в сердце.
description.vi: Bậc thầy quân sự nổi tiếng - Gia Cát Lượng Khổng Minh - người đã chết trong trận Ngũ Trượng Nguyên trở lại với cơ thể khi còn trẻ và tái sinh về Nhật Bản hiện đại. Được những người mê tiệc tùng ở Shibuya dẫn đi, Khổng Minh đã tới hộp đêm vang vọng tiếng nhạc EDM. Ở đó Khổng Minh đã gặp Tsukimi Eiko, người có mục tiêu trở thành ca sĩ, cũng chính là người đã vén lên tấm màn cuộc sống thứ hai của ông. Người sống vì thiên hạ thái bình ở thời Tam Quốc như ông sẽ sống vì điều gì đây...!?
description.pt-br: General dos Três Reinos, Kongming lutou toda a sua vida, enfrentando inúmeras batalhas que o transformaram no estrategista talentoso que ele era. Então, em seu leito de morte, ele desejava apenas renascer em um mundo pacífico… e foi enviado direto para o centro de festas moderno, Tóquio! Pode até mesmo um estrategista brilhante como Kongming se adaptar às batidas selvagens e às pessoas festeiras ainda mais selvagens?!
description.zh-hk: 三國時代的孔明在五丈原抱憾離世，如今他恢復成年輕時的模樣，以一身古時打扮來到現代日本‧澀谷。突兀的裝扮讓人以為他是在COSPLAY，後來被人帶往夜店狂歡，他在那裡認識了一心想成為歌手的月見英子。聽了她的歌聲大為感動，於是自告奮勇擔任她的軍師！來到現代，孔明要如何發揮他的軍事長才來協助英子完成「霸業」呢…？

altTitles.en: Mone-san's Overly Serious Way of Dating

altTitles.ja: モネさんのマジメすぎるつき合い方

altTitles.zh: 萌音同学太过认真的交往方式

altTitles.ko: 모네 양의 완전 진지한 사귀는 법

description.en: An alluring and popular honor student who goes by the name of Mone. Steadfast and diligent, she only has one foreseeable flaw; her philosophy on love is utterly trash! But both her mind and her heart might be swayed sooner than she thinks in this school love manga.

altTitles.en: Suddenly I Have a Husband and Children

altTitles.ja: 目覚めたら愛する夫と離婚協議中でした

altTitles.es-la: Caí en el fondo del abismo

description.en: It’s love at first sight when Estella, princess of the kingdom, meets Isaac, the margrave’s heir. She pines and pines after him only to learn that he’s already engaged! Devastated by the wedding, she hears a voice calling to her, when she suddenly falls into a pond and loses consciousness. She wakes to find out seven years have passed and she’s… married to Isaac?! Now, she has a collapsing marriage, two children, and a host of strange decisions to unravel and figure out why she ended up here!
description.es-la: Es amor a primera vista cuando Estella, princesa del reino, conoce a Isaac, el heredero del Margrave. Estella suspira por él y se entera de que ya está comprometido. Desolada por la boda, oye una voz que la llama cuando, de repente, cae en un estanque y pierde el conocimiento. Al despertar, descubre que han pasado siete años y que está… ¡¿casada con Isaac?! Ahora tiene un matrimonio que se derrumba, dos hijos y un montón de extrañas decisiones que desentrañar y averiguar por qué ha acabado aquí.

altTitles.ja: 描くなるうえは

description.en:
Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring.

The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

This is a comic artists × youth romantic comedy!
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja:
2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！

ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?

漫を持して描く漫画家×青春ラブコメディ！！
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

altTitles.ja: ケンガンモウソウスパイラル

description.en: A boy and a girl who are taking their eye exams at the same eye center get a little too caught up in their wild delusions.

Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

description.en:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations 
by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life.
 One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. 
Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! 
Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... 
and the entire world!

---
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
description.es-la: Anis Sophia, a princesa que lembrou de sua vida passada quando criança, assim como o seu amor intenso pela magia do seu eu antigo, saiu para vivenciar fantasias nesse mundo de fantasia. Um dia, durante um acidente mágico, ela se deparou com uma cena em que seu irmão, Algard, estava rompendo o noivado com sua pretendente, Euphilia. O que ninguém poderia prever é que esse estranho encontro acabaria mudando o rumo da história.

altTitles.ja: 酒処 春來荘日乗

description.en: Fifteen years have passed since the end of the Great War. Thriving at the bottom of the Imperial City of Flowers is the bar Haraiso, run by an idiosyncratic owner, Miss Haru. Various customers visit the restaurant every night, attracted by the delicious sake and snacks...

altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

altTitles.en: Looking for The Villainess Who Took My First Night
Looking for the Villainess Whom I Spent My First Time With

altTitles.es-la: Buscando a mi villana de una noche

description.en:
Since becoming the villainess 'Liberata' in the novel 'Leoni's Turbulent Life,' I have faced execution on the gallows twenty times!
Tired of the repetitive regression, I just got drunk with a mind of "Whatever happens, happens."
But why is the Grand Duke lying next to me?

"Don't worry, I won't let you die."
But...
"If you don't put everything back in its place in your 20th life, this world will be destroyed."
The fortune-teller leaves an ominous prophecy that can't be understood.

altTitles.ja: ハジメテノサツジン

description.en: "We are murderers, you know."  Mayu is your average high school girl who goes to a prestigious school for young ladies. Her school life there feels fulfilling thanks to her close friends, Oto and Yuu.  However, one day, Mayu and Yuu witnessed Oto pushing their class teacher who then fell and lost consciousness. Oto tries to explain that the latter has only passed out but...!?

Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

altTitles.th: เมนูรักปักใจท่านดยุก

altTitles.zh: 投喂悲剧男二后，他想HE了！

description.en:
"If I die after eating, that’ll be great!" Luana was born an abandoned princess of a kingdom that would soon be occupied. It’s the story where her death was decided anyway, so she ate what she wanted to eat. Her cooking has captured The General of the Conquering Army, the duke who was cursed and can’t taste foods? "There was nothing I wanted in this small kingdom, but now I think I do.” Why are you looking at me when you say that~?!!! The story of Legion, the occupier of the kingdom who lost his sense of taste due to the curse, and Luana, the only person who could make him taste food.

---
“Are you eating in this situation?”

“Of course! I’ll have to keep savoring the taste until I die. Do you want one?”

She was reincarnated in a novel as Luana, the abandoned princess. And her death was already decided. She just wanted to let people know about her cooking talent, but she was misunderstood as a witch because of her cheese jerky!

The General of the conquering army, Duke Legion, who had lost his sense of taste, took her to the Empire for her extraordinary jerkies and to break the curse that had come down from generation to generation.

“It is delicious, isn’t it?”

“Prepare the same for the dinner.”

She was happy to be able to cook and eat as much as delicious food as she wanted… But now, she also wanted to look after Legion.

‘Eat three meals a day, and make sure to make dessert. I’m sure he will be able to gain some weight…!’

–

The Duke took the jerky from the princess. On the surface, it was no different from any beef jerky. But when he took a bite of it, it felt like a new world had opened up. The jerky, made by the princess, felt more tender than the others as he gently crushed it with his teeth. The taste of condensed meat smudged his tongue as he chewed on. It was just as she said. He could feel the savory taste of the spicy meat, and at the end of the day, he wanted to have more. The desire that he had, faded for a while.

“I didn’t really want anything, but now I think I do.”
description.uk: «Ти їси в такій ситуації?» "Звичайно! Я буду насолоджуватися смаком до кінця. Хочеш шматочок?» У романі вона перевтілилася в Луанну, покинуту всіма принцесу. Її трагічна доля була вирішена заздалегідь. Дівчина просто хотіла показати людям свій кулінарний талант, а її, навпаки, охрестили відьмою. І, здавалось би, через що. Через в’ялений сир! Генерал армії-завойовника, герцог Легіон, який втратив почуття смаку, помітив принцесу і взяв до Імперії за її надзвичайні здібності. А може він сподівався, що Луанна зруйнує його прокляття, що повторювалось з покоління в покоління?

description.en:
The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).

description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

description.en: Orange Flavor is a comedy comics anthology written and drawn by Micah Rockandroll. A mix of short stories, comedy features, and one-page gags—It’s Cartoon Network meets Dan Clowes’s Eightball.

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.

altTitles.ja: とんがり帽子のアトリエ

description.en:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems…
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

altTitles.ja: キスで育てる私の王子様

description.en: Ji Na, the beautiful game anchor, challenges to dig treasure at the bottom of the lake late at night. She didn’t manage to dig treasure but she dug a young and cute vampire. As soon as the young and cute vampire, Li Chen kissed Ji Na, he turned into a handsome man, and his combat power exploded! He can repel monsters, and also do magic romantic fireworks. If the female lead, Ji Na does not kiss him, he will become a little cute boy and be bullied by others … With questions and curiosity, Ji Na and he began a “shameless” cohabitation life. Sure enough, soon the hunter came looking for them …
description.es-la: Gina, una bella “gamer”, acepta el reto de excavar en busca de un tesoro en el fondo de un lago a altas horas de la noche. En lugar de desenterrar un cofre lleno de monedas de oro, ¡desentierra un niño zombi! En cuanto éste besa a Gina, se transforma en un apuesto hombre llamado Li Chen, quien es un guerrero mágico caza mounstruos. ¿Se llevará bien esta parejita? ¡Descúbrelo!

description.en:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

After years of unrequited love, Angelica finally marries Lord Dominic, but he remains cold and distant. To make matters worse, Angelica’s uncle selfishly betrays the family. As endless debt and sorrow pain the poor girl, she tragically decides to end it all... Yet, she somehow wakes up in the past, returning to the day she proposed to Dominic. Was it all a dream? One thing is clear—Angelica won’t commit the same mistakes again. “I don’t love you anymore, Dominic. Let’s break off the engagement!”

altTitles.zh-hk: 重生者的魔法一定要特別

description.de:
"Jetzt, wo ich zurückgekehrt bin, werde ich keinen meiner Liebsten wieder sterben lassen!" Das Labyrinth der Schatten - die tödlichste Katastrophe, der die Menschheit jemals gegenüberstand. Desir Arman, einer der sechs Überlebenden der Menschheit, befindet sich im Labyrinth. Die sechs versuchen gemeinsam, die letzte Prüfung des Labyrinths zu meistern, scheitern aber, woraufhin die Welt untergeht. Aber als sich Desir gerade auf sein Ende vorbereitet, erscheint plötzlich vor ihm die Welt … von vor 13 Jahren?! Desir ist in die Vergangenheit zurückgekehrt, in eine Zeit, als er Schüler an der besten Magierschule seines war. Er und seine Liebsten wurden wieder vereint, und er ist entschlossen, dieses Mal sie und die Welt zu retten! Es bleiben noch drei Jahre bevor die Schattenwelt erscheint! Ändere die Vergangenheit und versammle mächtige Kameraden um dich, um die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"  
  
The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.  
Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end.  
However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!  
  
Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!  
  
Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!  
Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

description.fr:
Le monde est au bord de la destruction après une guerre dévastatrice de dix ans dans le « Labyrinthe des ombres ». Desir Herrman est l'un des derniers magiciens restants, mais il n'est pas assez puissant pour combattre l'ennemi fatal qui menace l'Humanité. Alors qu'il est certain que la fin est proche, il est renvoyé dans le temps, à l'époque où il étudiait la magie à la prestigieuse Académie Hebrion ! Grâce à cette seconde chance, Desir est bien décidé à sauver non seulement sa peau, mais également celle de ses amis et camarades perdus. Sachant déjà ce que le futur leur réserve, ses efforts pourront-ils faire la différence, ou bien seront-ils tous condamnés à revivre le même destin tragique ? Adapté du roman phare.

description.id:
"Agak disesalkan, tapi sebaiknya kita bersia-siap untuk mati!"
"Apa dunia akan benar-benar berakhir di sini?!"

Desir mengira semua sudah berakhir. Namun, ternyata dia kembali ke ujian masuk akademi hevrion 13 tahun yang lalu! Ia kembali berkumpul dengan orang-orang tercinta yang mati dalam dunia bayangan. Tiga tahun tersisa sebelum dunia bayangan muncul! 

"Kesempatan datang lagi, aku tidak akan kehilangan orang-orang yang kucintai untuk kedua kalinya!"

description.ja:
人類が迎えた最悪の災害、影の迷宮。 「デジール・アルマン」は影の迷宮の中で最後まで生き残った生存者6人のうちの1人である。 彼らは影の迷宮の最後のボスに挑戦したが、失敗し、世界は滅亡を迎えてしまった。 全てが終わったと思った瞬間、「デジール」の目の前に見える光景は…13年前の世界！？ 帝国最高の魔法学院、へブリオン学園の入学式に戻ってきた「デジール」 最悪の災害「影の世界」発生までの残りの時間は3年！ 過去を変え、強い仲間を集めて、世界を救えることはできるだろうか！

description.ko:
"다시 돌아온 이상, 사랑하는 사람들을 두 번 잃을 순 없어!"

인류가 맞이한 최악의 재앙, 그림자 미궁.
데지르 아르망은 미궁 속에서 
마지막까지 살아남은 최후의 생존자 6명 중 한 명이다.
그들은 그림자 미궁의 마지막 단계에 도전하지만 결국 실패하고
세계는 멸망을 맞이하고 만다.

모든 게 끝이라 생각했던 순간,
데지르의 눈앞에 펼쳐진 것은 다름 아닌 13년 전의 세상?!

제국 최고의 마법 학원, 헤브리온에 입학했던 순간으로 돌아온 데지르.
그림자 미궁에서 잃었던 소중한 사람들과 재회하게 되고,
사랑하는 사람들과 세상을 구하기 위해 과거를 바꾸고자 하는데…!

그림자 세계 발생까지 남은 시간은 3년!
과거를 바꾸고, 강한 동료를 모아 세상을 구원하라!

description.ru:
"Теперь, когда я вернулся, я не позволю дорогим для меня людям снова умереть".
Лабиринт Теней – главная катастрофа для человечества за всю историю его существования.
Дезир Арман – один из шести выживших людей.

Шесть попыток зачистить последний уровень лабиринта потерпели полную неудачу, и теперь мир близится к концу.
Однако, когда Дезир готовится встретить свою кончину, то, что открывается перед ним – это мир... 13 лет назад?!

Дезир возвращается в прошлое, когда он только поступил в самую престижную магическую академию магии в стране – Хаврион. Он вновь воссоединился со своими дорогими друзьями и готов изменить прошлое, чтобы спасти этот мир и тех, кто ему дорог.

Остались три года до появления Теневого Мира! Измените прошлое и соберите могущественных товарищей, чтобы спасти человечество!

description.vi:
Desir vật lộn trong Mê cung bóng tối suốt 10 năm dài đằng đẵng, chứng kiến đồng đội và bạn bè lần lượt ngã xuống, mãi đến khi toàn đội cả trăm người chỉ còn vỏn vẹn 6 người thì mới đánh bại được kẻ thù chung. Những tưởng đã cứu được thế giới khỏi nguy cơ diệt vong, nào ngờ tai họa bất ngờ ập đến cuốn trôi tất cả mọi thứ. Lần nữa tỉnh lại, Desir phát hiện mình đã quay ngược thời gian trở về ngày đầu nhập học ở Học viện Hebrion. Liệu lần này anh có thể bảo vệ những người mình thương yêu và cứu vớt thế giới không?

description.zh-hk:
「既然已經回來了，
就不能再次失去心愛的人們!」

人類正面臨最可怕的災難——影之迷宮。
戴基爾．阿曼德是迷宮裡最後的6名倖存者之一。
他們試圖挑戰迷宮的最後關卡，
然而卻以失敗告終，
世界最終走向滅亡。

當以為一切已經結束的那刻，
戴基爾卻回到了13年前的過去?!

當時的戴基爾正要進入帝國最強的魔法學院——
赫布里溫學院就讀，
並且與在迷宮中逝去的珍貴夥伴們重逢。
為了拯救他心愛的人們與這個世界，
他決心要改變過去...!

距離影之世界出現的時間只剩3年了!
快召集強悍的同伴一同拯救世界吧!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: 墨香 DARK LADY

altTitles.th: มุกฮยาง ดาร์กเลดี้

description.de: Der einzigartige Kampfkünstler und stolze Herrscher der Dämonensekte, Mookhyang, landet durch einen Fluch der gegnerischen Blutsekte in einer geheimnisvollen Fantasy-Welt. Doch wenn herauskommt, welch unglaubliche Kontrolle Mookhyang über Qi oder Mana hat, ist es nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis er erneut verflucht wird ... und sich in eine junge Frau verwandelt!? Wird die Macht über chinesische Kampfkunst in dieser Welt der Elfen, Magier und Drachen ausreichen, damit ein Mann (oder eine Frau) wieder nach Hause zurückkehren kann? Oder wird dieser arme Krieger letztendlich eine Niederlage erleiden?
description.en:
As the master of the School of Unholy Arts and as the undefeated Unmasked Demon, MookHyang unfortunately falls to a strange fantasy world by the magic of his enemies (School of Blood Arts). In the new world of elf, sorcerer, knight, and dragon, MookHyang’s adventure of finding a way back to his old world (Murim) unfolds.

description.fr: Mookhyang, pratiquant des arts martiaux et hiérarche de la Secte Démoniaque, se retrouve plongé dans un univers fantastique après avoir été victime d'une malédiction de la part de son ennemi, la Secte du Sang. Mais lorsque les capacités de contrôle du Qi (ou « mana ») de Mookhyang sont révélées au grand jour, ce dernier se retrouve bientôt à nouveau maudit... et transformé en... jeune fille ! Dans cet univers où vivent elfes, mages, chevaliers et dragons, la maîtrise des art martiaux chinois suffira-t-elle à un homme (ou à une « femme » ? ) pour survivre et retrouver le chemin vers un monde ordinaire ? Ou bien cet humble guerrier déclarera-t-il forfait ?
description.ja: 千年に一人の達人「脱魔」の域に達した魔教の教主、墨香。 しかし武林の支配を目論む張仁傑の怪しげな術により異なる世界へ飛ばされてしまう。 言葉も文化も分からない世界で、墨香の孤独な戦いが幕を開ける。
description.ko:
마교의 교주로서 극강의 무공을 자랑하던 묵향은 적들(혈교)에 의해 생전 처음 보는 생소한 이세계(판타지 세계)로 떨어지게 된다. 그곳에서 엘프, 마법사, 기사, 드래곤 등 새로운 존재들과 만나며... 무림 최고수 묵향이 원래 자신의 세상(무림)으로 돌아가기 위해 긴 모험을 떠나게 된다는 스토리.

한국의 무협소설과 판타지 문학을 사랑하는 수많은 독자들이 기다려왔던 초대형 이벤트― 웹툰계를 뒤흔들 다시없을 프로젝트가 시작된다! 
1999년부터 시작된 전설, 누계부수 300만부... 무협소설과 판타지문학을 접목시킨 기념비적인 장르소설인 [묵향]이 드디어 만화화!! 

한국 무협판타지의 한 획을 그었던 전동조 작가의 메가히트 장르소설 [묵향]을 만화화! 만화의 내용은 원작의 2부격인 [다크레이디] 편에서부터 시작한다.

Будучи мастером школы темных искусств и непобедимым незыблемым истым демоном, Мукхян, к несчастью, попадает в странный фэнтезийный мир из-за магии своих врагов (школа искусств крови). В новом мире эльфов, колдунов, рыцарей и драконов, разворачивается приключение Мукхяна по поиску пути назад в его старый мир, Мурим.

description.th: มุกฮยาง เจ้าสำนักปีศาจได้ถูกส่งตัวข้ามพิภพมายังโลกใหม่ที่ภาษา, วัฒนธรรมและทุกๆ อย่างได้แตกต่างจากยุทธจักรของเขาอย่างสิ้นเชิง ซ้ำร้ายยังต้องคำสาปให้กลายร่างเป็นเด็กผู้หญิงแสนบอบบางที่เขารังเกียจ แล้วเขาจะหาทางกลับคืนร่างและหวนกลับไปยังยุทธจักรของเขาได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 魔教教主墨香在经历脱胎换骨之后，修道成仙。 却在即将称霸武林之际遭人谋算，被移送至了精灵、魔法师、骑士、龙等生物共存的异世界里，墨香为了重回原来的世界，开始了冒险之旅！
description.pt-br: MookHyang, o mestre da Escola das Artes Profanas e o invencível Demônio Exposto, é infelizmente enviado a um mundo de fantasia estranho pela magia de seus inimigos da Escola das Artes de Sangue. Em um novo mundo com elfos, feiticeiros, cavaleiros e dragões, a aventura de MookHyang em busca de um meio para voltar ao seu velho mundo (Murim) tem início.
description.zh-hk:
身懷絕世武功的魔教教主墨香，被來自血教的敵人
送往生平從未見過的陌生異域(奇幻世界)。
在那裡，他遇上了精靈、魔法師、騎士、龍族...等
前所未聞的人事物。
為了回到原本的世界(武林)，
武林第一人墨香踏上旅程，一場大冒險就此展開!

喜愛韓國武俠小說與奇幻文學的讀者
引頸期盼的超大型活動!
震撼Webtoon界的絕倫企劃正式啟動!
1999年開始連載的傳說之作、累積銷量高達300萬冊...
結合武俠與奇幻的劃時代小說「墨香」，終於漫畫化!!

為韓國奇幻武俠立下全新里程碑的大師級作家
JEON DongZo精心打造的超高人氣小說「墨香」，
終於漫畫化啦!!

漫畫內容由原著第二部《Dark Lady》開展。

title.en: To My Kind and Evil Relationship

description.es-la: Selena y Millard, miembros de una familia de enemigos y amantes desde hace mucho tiempo. Después del incidente de la noche anterior a la ceremonia de graduación de la academia, pensaron que nunca se volverían a ver, pero se les ordena casarse para resolver la repentina aparición de “personas no muertas”. Selena decide utilizar a Millard para su propio beneficio, pero se enamora del infinitamente amable Millard…

title.en: Ochikobore Kenshi, Tsuihousareta no de Majutsushi ni Tenkou suru - Kenshi no Toki wa Gomi Skill datta "Zettai Kioku" wa Majutsushi ni Totte wa Kami Skill deshita

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ剣士、追放されたので魔術師に転向する ～剣士のときはゴミスキルだった『絶対記憶』は魔術師にとっては神スキルでした～

altTitles.en: The Exiled Failed Swordsman Becomes a Sorcerer ~ [Absolute Memory], Which Was a Garbage Skill for a Swordsman, Is a God Skill for a Sorcerer!

description.en: In a world where swordsmanship and magic clash, Durandal is born into one of the world’s most prestigious swordsman families. However, his innate skill is ‘Absolute Memory’. A skill that allows him to never forget anything he has seen or heard, but it was completely useless in swordsmanship where power is everything. Eventually, the banished Durandal encounters ‘magic’, and starts to change the life he had once given up on!!

title.en: The Fabulous Lives of the Hillington Sisters

altTitles.ja: 脇役令嬢とヒロインの妹

description.en:
Hildea Hillington, the daughter of duke Hillington, always knew that she was a mere supporting role in the story. She also knew that her destiny was to watch her younger sister, Roserielle, get married to young and ambitious duke Gabriel Velkius.

But something was definitely off. Why does Gabriel say that he loves me? He's supposed to be in love with my sister!

altTitles.ja: 迷宮の王

description.en:
Within the tenth-floor boss room of the Sazardon Labyrinth, the mighty minotaur awakens once more. Unlike its predecessors, slain at the hands of treasure-seeking adventurers, this monster’s primal urges push it further than ever before. Kill. Consume. Grow stronger. The more powerful its opponent, the more powerful it becomes. Even the very rules of the labyrinth seem to bend to its indomitable will. Can none triumph against this bovine behemoth? Will the minotaur ever meet its match…?

---

Notes:

- Was on hiatus since June 2022 till February 2024
- Official english translation of [light novel](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08F45DG62)

I entered the world of a novel suddenly. I thought that I could return to reality by falling in love, but death was what awaited me in the end. Defenestration, strangulation, poisoning, drowning, and burning to death... Even after dying a hundred times and returning, the novel still doesn't end...

Karen Haier, who greets her 117th birthday trapped within a novel, now decides to become a murderer.
description.fr:
Elle s’est réveillée dans un roman.
Si elle arrive à trouver le véritable amour, alors elle pourra avoir sa fin heureuse.
Cependant, après la fin de l’histoire, ce qui l’a accueillie, c’est la mort.
Et lorsqu’elle a rouvert les yeux, elle était revenue au début de l’histoire.
Elle est tombée amoureuse encore une fois, mais la fin qui l’attendait, était toujours la mort.
Poison… strangulation… maladie… chute… renversée… immolée… affamée à en mourir…
Alors qu’elle fêtait son 117e anniversaire, Carynne Hare décida de devenir une meurtrière.
description.uk:
Карен потрапила в книгу і подолала всі незгоди, зустріла своє кохання. Розплющивши очі, дівчина опинилася на початку свого шляху - в саду, де завжди йшов дощ. Одного разу Карен спало на думку: найсильніше людей турбує не кохання, а смерть. Її охопило хвилювання. Почуття набридли і у свій 117-й День народження вона вирішила стати вбивцею.

Увага! Тайтл 16+.  Ми не несемо відповідальність за ваш емоційний стан. Присутні удушення, відруб голів і море крові, різні.
description.pt-br:
Fui reencarnada para um livro. Se eu encontrasse meu verdadeiro amor, minha vida teria um final feliz. No entanto, quando a história chegou ao fim, o que me cumprimentou foi a morte.

Quando ela abriu os olhos, ela se viu no início de tudo. Ela decidiu se apaixonar de novo. Envenenamento, estrangulamento, queda, doença, morte por esmagamento, morte por queda, morte de… Depois de comemorar seu aniversário de 124 anos, Karen Haier decidiu se tornar uma assassina.

title.en: The Duke's Villainous Daughter Is Depressed

altTitles.en: The Melancholy of the Wicked Duke's Lady
The Melancholy of the Evil Duke's Young Lady

description.en: Irene Song had transmigrated inside a novel and became the villainous daughter of a duke. However, the duke, who was unaware of this fact, simply thought she had amnesia and sends her off to marry the second prince of Rennes Empire. Little did she know that the second prince was cursed by an evil wizard and turned him into a dog during the day and could only turn back to a human at night. What’s worse, she even named it “Tofu” after she found it wandering in the Imperial Palace. Who would have known it was her own husband!
